flawed_nl_solution:
His total expenditure so far is $50+$35+$15 = $<<50+35+15=1000>>1000
To make a profit of 10%, he has to make a total of $1000+($1000*(10/100)) = $<<1000+(1000*(10/100))=1100>>1100 from sales
To make $1100 from the sales of 10 bags, each bag should cost $1100/10 = $<<1100/10=110>>110
#### 110

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
